hz_context_t
typedef struct
hz_context_t

Shaping context structure.

Fields
font

Font used.

script

Script.

language

Language.

dir

Writing direction.

features

Array of wanted features.

Functions
hz_shape_full
void hz_shape_full(hz_context_t *ctx,hz_section_t *sect)

Shapes a section of text.

Parameters
ctx
hz_context_t*

The shaping context.

sect
hz_section_t*

The section to shape.
